title: DOTD Standards for GPS Data Collection Accuracy
text: Transportation Research Board > Blurbs > DOTD Standards for GPS Data Collection Accuracy Text Size: DOTD Standards for GPS Data Collection Accuracy http://www.ltrc.lsu.edu/pdf/2015/FR_539.pdf 173183 DOTD Standards for GPS Data Collection Accuracy The Louisiana Department of Transportation and Development (DOTD) has released a report that focuses on its standards of practice when utilizing Global Navigational Satellite (GPS) for mapping-grade applications and discusses enhancements to the nationwide horizontal and vertical spatial reference framework.   9/15/2015
